In January 2019, Al Hussein Technical University (HTU) launched the National ICT Upskilling programme in collaboration with the Ministry of Digital Economy and Entrepreneurship (MoDEE). The programme aims to arm job-seeking ICT graduates with skills that are likely to improve their chances of finding employment opportunities in advanced technologies.
